vote.text: Amendment SA 2874 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 2874 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 60 - 36. Record Vote Number: 99.
Point of order that the amendment violates Section 311(b) of S.Con.Res. 70, 110th Congress, raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2874.
Cloture on amendment SA 2874 invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 61 - 38. Record Vote Number: 96.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 2874 presented in Senate.
Amendment SA 2874 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Reed.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2874 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
